name: Camp Fire VR
description:
Enjoy a mindfulness experience interacting with different environmental interacts. Roasting marshmallows, playing with fire, enjoying the night sky, being immersed within the closed environment getting away from your stressful life.

Requirements:
Only available for, Oculas Rift & Oculas Go
